article_title: The Alliance Between Government And The One Percent
article_text: When our current President was elected, many progressives saw the dawning of a new epoch, a more egalitarian and more just Age of Obama. Instead we have witnessed the emergence of the Age of Oligarchy.

article_summary:
When our current President was elected, many progressives saw the dawning of a new epoch, a more egalitarian and more just Age of Obama.
Instead we have witnessed the emergence of the Age of Oligarchy.
